body: At 9th level, a blight druid gains immunity to all diseases, including natural and supernatural diseases. She also becomes immune to effects that would cause her to become sickened or nauseated. This ability replaces venom immunity.
name: Blightblooded
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Blight Druid/Blightblooded
